ðŸ“– Summary: TUIOS is a terminal-based window manager built with Go, offering a modern, efficient interface for managing multiple terminal sessions. It features a vim-like modal interface, comprehensive keyboard shortcuts, workspace support, and mouse interaction, leveraging the Charm stack (Bubble Tea v2 and Lipgloss v2).
